entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tuktoyaktuk Airport 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016

Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
